===================
import
===================

{% extends "layout.html" %}
{% from "test.html" import a, b as c %}
{% import "meh.html" as meh %}
{% import "module" as m without context %}
{% import "module" as m with context %}
{% from "module" import test without context %}
{% from "module" import test with context %}
{% from "foo" import bar, baz with context %}

----

(source
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (extends_statement
          (string_literal)))))
  (definition
    (words))
  (definition
    (control
      (statement
        (import_statement
          (import_from
            (string_literal))
          (identifier)
          (identifier)
          (import_as
            (identifier))))))

    (words))

          (string_literal)
          (import_as
            (identifier))))))

          (import_as
            (identifier))
          (import_attribute
            (attribute_context))))))
